description:
Provides a RAM User resource.

-> **NOTE:** When you want to destroy this resource forcefully(means release all the relationships associated with it automatically and then destroy it) without set `force`  with `true` at beginning, you need add `force = true` to configuration file and run `terraform plan`, then you can delete resource forcefully.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Comments.description: Comment of the RAM user. This parameter can have a string of 1 to 128 characters.

DisplayName.description: Name of the RAM user which for display. This name can have a string of 1 to 128 characters or Chinese characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or Chinese characters or hyphens, such as "-",".", and must not end with a hyphen.

Force.description: This parameter is used for resource destroy. Default value is `false`.

Mobile.description: Phone number of the RAM user. This number must contain an international area code prefix, just look like this: 86-18600008888.

Name.description: Name of the RAM user. This name can have a string of 1 to 64 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin with a hyphen.
